header.slogan: Your reliable partner in the supply of rare, prescription, and hard-to-find medicines

footer.address:

homepage.contact_us_text: Contact us to find out how we can help you with searching for and delivering the necessary medications — quickly, transparently, and with a quality guarantee.
homepage.quality_text:
At Axivita Pharm, we adhere to strict standards at every stage of our operations — from partner selection to the delivery of medicines. We work exclusively with trusted suppliers and logistics operators to ensure the safety and compliance of the entire supply chain.

All company processes comply with Good Distribution Practice (GDP) requirements, and our warehouse facilities are licensed according to current European regulations.

You can find up-to-date licenses and supporting documentation here.
homepage.services_1: Access to both locally registered and hard-to-find or temporarily unavailable (unlicensed) medicines
homepage.services_2: We ensure reliable and fast delivery, storage in certified warehouses with temperature and humidity control, as well as full documentation transparency at every stage.
homepage.services_3: An established network of suppliers, quality control, and full support throughout every stage of logistics. We provide flexible and secure solutions for the import and export of pharmaceutical products.
homepage.services_4: Comprehensive solutions for clinical trial supply — from sourcing and procurement of comparators to organizing GDP-compliant delivery.
homepage.services_1_title: Supply of Licensed and Unlicensed Medicines
homepage.services_3_title: Supply of medicines for clinical trials
homepage.about_us_text:
We help patients, healthcare providers, and organizations find essential solutions when standard pathways are unavailable.

By working with certified manufacturers, licensed suppliers, and specialized distributors worldwide, we ensure the delivery of pharmaceuticals strictly in accordance with current regulations and international standards.

Our team consists of experts with deep knowledge of the pharmaceutical market, always ready to offer a tailored approach. We handle each request with care and strive to provide not just delivery — but trust and stability for everyone involved.

Get in touch with us to discuss how we can help you receive the right medicines at the right time.
homepage.about_us_slogan: Reliable support where it matters most
homepage.division_austria_text:
The company provides access to high-quality medicines for pharmacists, medical institutions, and wholesale companies throughout Austria.

Thanks to a broad international network of trusted suppliers, we deliver hard-to-access and life-saving medications in full compliance with Austrian legislation and Named Patient Use regulations.

Contact us to discuss your needs — we will find the optimal solution for your specific request.
homepage.division_world_text:
Axivita Pharm supplies licensed and unlicensed medicines across the globe.
We work with certified partners and comply with GDP and local regulations to ensure fast, safe, and legal delivery — wherever you are.

Global reach. Guaranteed quality. Personalized support.

about.intro:
Your trusted partner in the supply of rare, prescription, and hard-to-access medicines.

We are an international pharmaceutical company specializing in the search, procurement, and delivery of unlicensed and scarce medicinal products.
We help patients and medical organizations gain access to essential medications, even if they are unavailable from local suppliers.
about.slogan: We believe that everyone deserves the best life, and we do everything to make that possible.

advantages.title: Global Reach
advantages.text: We work with trusted suppliers and logistics partners worldwide, enabling us to quickly source and deliver essential medications, regardless of the country.

advantages.title: Personalized Approach
advantages.text: We tailor optimal procurement and logistics solutions based on the urgency and specifics of each order.

advantages.title: Speed and Accuracy
advantages.text: Minimal delivery times, tracking at every stage, and precise adherence to deadlines.

advantages.title: Compliance with Standards
advantages.text: Legal clarity and transparency. Strict compliance with international and local pharmaceutical regulations.

advantages.title: Quality and Safety
advantages.text: Verification of medication authenticity, transport, and storage conditions.

advantages.title: Flexibility and Support
advantages.text: Full transaction support and problem-solving at every stage.

about.division_world_text:
Axivita Pharm supplies licensed and unlicensed medicines across the globe.
We work with certified partners and comply with GDP and local regulations to ensure fast, safe, and legal delivery — wherever you are.

Global reach. Guaranteed quality. Personalized support.
about.mission_text: Making the unavailable accessible by connecting patients with life-saving medicines in the shortest possible time — through technology, care, and efficient logistics.
core_principles: By working directly with verified manufacturers, license holders, and certified distributors worldwide, we ensure reliable pharmaceutical logistics. The Axivita Pharm team possesses deep expertise in international regulation, allowing us to effectively handle even the most complex challenges in medicine supply.
about.values_intro: Our values reflect the company’s philosophy, shape our approach to partnerships, interactions with patients and society, and define the direction of our development.

values.title: Accessibility
values.text: The company strives to make medications for complex and rare diseases available to every patient, regardless of their location or financial situation.

values.title: Partnership
values.text: Openness to cooperation with the medical community, charitable foundations, and other interested parties.

values.title: Caring for People
values.text: The company does more than supply medicines — it works to improve people’s quality of life by offering support, consultations, and a personalized approach to each case.

values.title: Innovation
values.text: The company utilizes modern technologies in logistics, analytics, and supply chain management to ensure the fast and efficient delivery of life-saving medicines.

values.title: Responsibility
values.text: The company understands that lives depend on its work, which is why it adheres to the highest standards of quality, safety, and ethics in the supply of medical products.

values.title: Reliability
values.text: The company maintains open and honest communication with all clients and partners, guaranteeing fair business practices and accurate information about deliveries.

service.title: Services
service.access_to_medicines: Access to Medicines from Anywhere in the World

sections.title: Supply of Licensed and Unlicensed Medicines
sections.text:
We understand that every clinical case is unique and that access to specific medicines can be critically important. That’s why we offer flexible, personalized logistics solutions with a strong focus on safety, legality, and delivery efficiency.

What we offer:

Supply of licensed medicines directly from manufacturers and authorized distributors.

Sourcing and delivery of unlicensed medicines upon physician request (Named Patient Supply), in full compliance with international and local regulations.

Full-cycle support — from inquiry and alternative selection to export and import, documentation, and shipment tracking.

Cooperation only with reliable partners who comply with GDP standards and hold valid WDA licenses.

Individual case management: each request is handled with attention to the needs of the specific patient or healthcare institution.

sections.title: Supply of Medicines for Clinical Trials
sections.text:
We offer comprehensive solutions for the provision of clinical trial medicines — from sourcing and procurement of comparators to organizing GDP-compliant delivery.

We partner with CROs, pharmaceutical companies, and contract manufacturers to ensure full compliance with the requirements of each project.

What we offer:

Supply of comparators and reference products with full documentation confirming legality and quality of origin.

Ability to work with both international and local manufacturers, depending on study objectives.

Personalized batch planning: selection of specific quantities, batches, dosage forms, and expiry dates.

Certification, labeling, and packaging in accordance with study protocols and sponsor requirements.

Reliable logistics and distribution per GDP standards, including temperature control, shipment tracking, and documentation flow.

Project support by an experienced team, considering all aspects of clinical protocols and regulatory compliance.

sections.title: Global Wholesale Trade
Logistics, Warehousing, and Distribution

quality.title: Quality
quality.slogan: At Axivita Pharm, we believe that medicine supply is not just logistics — it's a responsibility for people’s health and lives.
quality.slogan_text: That’s why we strictly adhere to international quality standards at every stage: from sourcing and procurement to storage, transportation, and final delivery to the client.
quality.certified_quality: The Quality of Our Services is confirmed by certifications

sections.title: Compliance with International Standards
sections.text: We operate in full compliance with GDP (Good Distribution Practice) requirements and hold all necessary licenses for wholesale pharmaceutical distribution. This guarantees that every medicine goes through proper storage and delivery processes without compromising its effectiveness.

sections.title: Transparency and Traceability
sections.text: All deliveries are accompanied by complete documentation and transparent control procedures. This ensures a high level of accountability and eliminates risks related to counterfeits, errors, or storage violations.

sections.title: Working with Verified Partners
sections.text: We collaborate exclusively with certified manufacturers, distributors, and logistics providers. This allows us to maintain consistently high quality and minimize risks throughout the supply chain.

sections.title: Patient Safety — Our Priority
sections.text: Every decision we make is focused on ensuring the highest level of safety and treatment effectiveness. We don’t just deliver medications — we create the conditions for quality treatment, even in the most complex and sensitive cases.

sections.title: Flexibility and Risk Control
sections.text: AxiVita Pharm ensures active risk management at all levels of operation. We respond swiftly to regulatory changes, conduct internal audits, and continuously improve our standards to meet the industry's strictest requirements.
